body:
Thomas Seebohm wrote:
> 
> I am trying to generate animation paths for use in Radiance (ranimate) with
> rshow. I understand that there is a camera option but the only information
> that I can find on using the camera is a command option "-kr file" with the
> explanation "know file (camera animation). What is a know file?
Ops, that should read 'knot' file, containing the spline parameters. The
pre-1998 rshow, running only on IRIX-GL, had the animation spline
feature, but I haven't come around to add it back into the new Open-GL
rshow. 
Meanwhile, one way would be to use rshow for writing a series of view
files and do the interpolation externally.
-Peter
